footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the PSE Team

hero.createText: Create interactive data-driven twins of your machines, buildings or processes — easily via DigiTwin Studio

fillOnly.title: Fill only what you need to!
fillOnly.description: Gone are the days of filling every field in AASX explorer when they can be filled automatically, DigiTwin Studio has got your back, With DigiTwin Studio you only fill what you really have to.

easyToUse.title: As easy as it gets!
easyToUse.description: The UI has been designed with the user experience in mind and is easily usable. Now everyone can create submodels.

advanced.title: Advanced only when you need it to be
advanced.description: DigiTwin Studio will only ask for you to provide the necessary information but will still allow you to input whatever you might need through advanced section.

signin.title: We recommend signing into the website to experience all of the features we offer such as saving your files, but you can continue as a guest if you wish
signin.policy: By using our services, you accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the model "{{modelName}}"?
dashboard.undoPublished: This action will also unpublish your model. This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.noModelsDescription: You haven't created any digital twin models yet. Get started by creating your first model!
dashboard.noModelsFoundDescription: No models match your search criteria "{{searchTerm}}". Try a different search term.
dashboard.missingInfo: Model information is missing. Cannot download file.
dashboard.authRequired: Authentication required. Please sign in and try again.
dashboard.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to download this file.
dashboard.fileNotFound: File not found. The model may have been deleted.
dashboard.connectionError: Connection error: Unable to reach the server.
dashboard.networkError: Network error: Unable to download file. Please check your connection and try again.
dashboard.missingInfoDelete: Model information is missing. Cannot delete model.
dashboard.accesDeniedDelete: Access denied. You do not have permission to delete this model.
dashboard.modelNotFound: Model not found. It may have already been deleted.
dashboard.networkErrorDelete: Network error: Unable to delete model. Please check your connection and try again.

tooltips.name: This name will be used as the title for your model in the Dashboard and Marketplace
tooltips.description: Optional field for a short description of your model
tooltips.id: Unique identifier for the Asset Administration Shell
tooltips.assetKind: Denotes whether the asset is of kind "Type", "Instance" or none of these types is applicable
tooltips.globalAssetId: Identifier of the asset, the Asset Administration Shell is representing
tooltips.specificAssetId: Additional domain-specific, typically proprietary identifier for the asset like serial number, manufacturer part ID, customer part IDs, etc.

templateSelection.title: Select a Template
templateSelection.searchPlaceholder: Search templates by name or description...
templateSelection.noTemplatesSearch: No templates match your search criteria "{{searchTerm}}". Try a different search term.
templateSelection.noTemplatesAvailable: No templates are available at the moment.

createComplete.title: Model Created
createComplete.subtitle: Your model with the Name {{modelName}} has been created and is ready for download.
createComplete.dashboardAccess: You can access this model from your dashboard at any time.
createComplete.incompleteInfo: Model information is incomplete. Download functionality may not be available.

toasts.missingInfo: Model information is missing. Cannot download file.
toasts.authRequired: Authentication required. Please sign in and try again.
toasts.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to download this file.
toasts.fileNotFound: File not found. The model may have been deleted.
toasts.connectionError: Connection error: Unable to reach the server.
toasts.networkError: Network error: Unable to download file. Please check your connection and try again.
